meta-review.comment: Warhammer 40000 Rogue Trader takes you on a crunchy, immersive journey through the grim darkness of the 41st millennium. While the game boasts an excellent narrative and captivating combat, it unfortunately comes with its fair share of bugs, which can be a bit of a letdown. However, the intricate universe and deep RPG systems make it a fine addition to the Warhammer 40K games. Embark on this vast, sprawling CRPG if you're ready to embrace the dense lore and face the challenges of the 41st millennium.
